text: Vspomni (o prorok!), kak Allakh predstavil vam vashikh vragov malochislennymi v vashikh glazakh i umen'shil vashu chislennost' v ikh glazakh, i oni gordilis' i radovalis' svoyemu prevoskhodstvu. Eto dlya togo, chtoby kazhdyy otryad vstupil v srazheniye protiv drugogo i chtoby svershilos' delo, kotoroye Allakh prednachertal i znal i kotoroye dolzhno bylo svershit'sya. Ved' lish' u Allakha - sversheniye vsekh del! V mire, nichto ne sovershayetsya bez vedoma i prednachertaniya Allakha
